atlantis.engine.state

Class StateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.framework.GameComponent
      • atlantis.framework.DrawableGameComponent
        • atlantis.engine.state.StateManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable, IUpdateable

    public class StateManager
extends DrawableGameComponent
    A State manager that is responsible to manage game states.

    Yann
